select t.id, t.site_id, t.nickname, t.email, t.phone_number, t.content, t.status, su_edit_user.nickname as edit_user, t.edit_date, t.create_date from cms_feedback t left join sys_user su_edit_user on su_edit_user.id = t.edit_user

select t.site_id, t.nickname, t.email, t.phone_number, t.content, sd_status.name as status from cms_feedback t left join sys_dict sd_status on sd_status.code = t.status and sd_status.dict_type = 'commonStatus'
